name: Night Rider (Hatsuharu Yasa)
description:
A very simple casual game where you ride a spaceship and dodge some obstacles.

In other words a flappy bird's clone game.

The controls are simple, which are:

  • Press "Space" to escalate or deescalate
  • Press "R" to open the pause menu

It can be said that this game is still in its early build. There is a potential of having a lot of bugs and malfunction in the game, but more updates and patches will be added in the future.

Any suggestions or critiques regarding the game are open.

Thank you for playing the game :)

-Yasa
